import React, {useState} from 'react'; import {useHistory} from 'react-router-dom'; const NewSupply = () => { const [newPurchase, setNewPurchase] = useState({ name: '', price: 0, quantity: 0, }); const history = useHistory(); const handleSubmit = () => { history.push("/add-supply") } const finishedAdding = () => { history.push("/") } return (
handleSubmit()} style={{margin:"25px", padding:"25px", border:"solid black 2px"}}>

setNewPurchase({...newPurchase, price: e.target.value})}/>
) } export default NewSupply
